medicaments.name: Paracetamol
medicaments.description: Paracetamol is a pain reliever and a fever reducer.

medicaments.name: Zestril
medicaments.description: Lisinopril is the generic drug name for Zestril. It is a blood pressure medication in the angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor group of drugs.

medicaments.name: Levothyroxine (Synthroid)
medicaments.description: This medication is an artificial form of thyroxine (T4), a hormone that comes from the thyroid gland.

medicaments.name: Atorvastatin (Lipitor)
medicaments.description: Statin therapies, such as atorvastatin (Lipitor), are the first-line treatment option for high cholesterol.
